column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////So all Chicagoans swear by this place. I think it's awful - but I've only lived here for a year
column2: so I guess it takes multiple horrid winters to make you love this strange sort of cheese soup the locals call pizza. The wait is super long
column3: this place is vastly overhyped. Portions are huge. Maybe it's better delivered?.. not coming back here
column4: even if out of town guests want to try deep dish pizza.
